alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Beltrami, south central Lake of the Woods and northern Clearwater Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 900 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Thorhult to near Weme. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lower Red Lake, Gonvick, Little Rock, Berner, Thorhult, Oaks Corner and Red Lake Nation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater
